entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon then northwest 50 gusting to 70. High 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
